def.name: Patient

a:t.value: Measles containing Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Measles containing Doses Administered to Patient that are in the Primary series

a:t.value: Number of Measles Primary Series doses

def.name: Client's age is less than 9 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 9 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 9 months

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 9 months-41

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Ongoing transmission: Countries with ongoing transmission in which the risk of measles mortality remains high (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 9 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months)

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: MCV Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: MCV Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Number of MCV Primary Series Doses Administered

a:s.a:s: "MCV Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient"

source.name: MCV Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: No measles primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No measles primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Measles-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No measles primary series doses were administered-127

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Ongoing transmission: Countries with ongoing transmission in which the risk of measles mortality remains high (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 9 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Low transmission: Countries with low levels of measles transmission (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 12 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months)

a:s.a:s: "Number of MCV Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of MCV Primary Series Doses Administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 9 months

a:t.name: decision

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.MCV dose 0: Measles-containing vaccine dose 0 (MCV0) administration

def.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) ≥ 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks-92

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Ongoing transmission: Countries with ongoing transmission in which the risk of measles mortality remains high (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 9 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Low transmission: Countries with low levels of measles transmission (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 12 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.MCV dose 0: Measles-containing vaccine dose 0 (MCV0) administration

a:s.a:s: "No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks
